mapper.insert: insert into druglist(entpName, itemName, itemSeq, efcyQesitm, useMethodQesitm, atpnQesitm, intrcQesitm, seQesitm, depositMethodQesitm, openDe, updateDe, itemImage) values(#{entpName}, #{itemName}, #{itemSeq}, #{efcyQesitm}, #{useMethodQesitm}, #{atpnQesitm}, #{intrcQesitm}, #{seQesitm}, #{depositMethodQesitm}, #{openDe}, #{updateDe}, #{itemImage})
